testcase.name: Validate the addition of tshirt in shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given The website to order is available.....................................passed When i am able to login using valid credentials.............................passed And i enter "T-Shirt" in Search Box.........................................passed When i check Tshirt is inStock..............................................passed And i click Add to cart button..............................................passed Then i get shopping cart summary and tshirt ordered.........................passed And i verify order details on order confirmation page.......................passed

testcase.name: Validate the change of First Name
testcase.system-out: Given The website to order is available.....................................passed When i am able to login using valid credentials.............................passed And i click on MyAccountPage Link...........................................passed When i click on My personalinfo Page........................................passed And i change My first name..................................................passed Then i am able to saveInfo..................................................passed
